title.rendered: Trends and Insights Worksheet #2: Employee Training and Review

content.rendered:
Trends and Insights Worksheet #2: Employee Training and Review

Johnson Consulting Group’s Performance Tracker X is the complete customer management tool that evaluates staff and customer experience, streamlines success plans, and improves your bottom line. Through the power of six different survey types, our system analyzes all of the data for you, giving owners and managers hundreds of different reporting options to see what’s going on in their business. Every year JCG releases a trends and analysis report based on Performance Tracker X survey data. This year Johnson Consulting Group did something a little different, we included a ten-year review and a Covid-19 impact report. From there we created downloadable worksheets based on major takeaways from the 2022 Performance Tracker X Trends and Insight report. These worksheets are designed as a tool to help funeral and cemetery business owners and managers tap into unthought potential. This weeks worksheet is based off employee performance. See what exercises we created to help with employee training.

 

Download our FREE worksheet below!

Trends and Insights Worksheet #2: Employee Training and Review

 

Contact us today to learn more about how Johnson Consulting Group can help you grow or sell your business.
